column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Other than those small factors
column2: I really loved the candlelit ambiance
column4: and my food was delicious. We started with the Salmon Tartare which was really good. I started to wish we didn't ask for bread at that point because I was already getting full. But we kept going and for dinner
column5: my boyfriend had the Steak Frites which he enjoyed. I had the chicken which was delicious
column6: but the winner of the night BY FAR was the Butternut Squash I had on the side. Amazing!
